Author: wbradt#2043
Content: Is https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/KomodoPlatform/wiki/barterDEX-API-Summary-by-Category the most up-to-date documentation for the RPC API?

Author: wbradt#2043
Content: I think those are different APIs than the BarterDEX API.

Author: wbradt#2043
Content: The second one links to https://docs.komodoplatform.com/barterDEX/barterDEX-API.html, which I think, but am not sure if, is the same as what I linked @webworker01

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @wbradt which api in particular are you interested in?

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: webworker linked to the core KMD daemon RPC API

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: the other, is a higher level, BarterDEX API. That is an application level API, which is RPC based

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: barterdex API uses the KMD RPC API, underneath

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: as well as talks to many other coin daemon RPC APIs

Author: wbradt#2043
Content: Yes. BarterDEX API is what I am interested in

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: hope that clears it up

Author: wbradt#2043
Content: Is what I linked the most up-to-date documentation of it?

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: barterdex API docs have not been kept super-up-date, your link was last updated in Jun, which is maybe the latest, but also probably a bit out of date

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: there is now a HyperDEX which uses the barterdex API underneath, but maybe has it's own API. @lukechilds knows more about hyperdex I believe

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @wbradt what is your end goal, what are you trying to accomplish?

Author: wbradt#2043
Content: I am trying to write a simple marketmaker for BarterDEX/ learn about DEXes and would like some more info on what some of the endpoints do

Author: wbradt#2043
Content: @dukeleto ^

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @wbradt #dev-tradebots is where core dev of barterdex-ish things happen, and @cipi is one of our resident barterdex experts (he runs all the electrum server backends that allows Agama to use light wallet mode on various  coins)

Author: wbradt#2043
Content: Thank you @dukeleto
